metadata.title: CVE-2021-41039 on Ubuntu 22.10 (kinetic) - medium.
metadata.description: In versions 1.6 to 2.0.11 of Eclipse Mosquitto, an MQTT v5 client connecting with a large number of user-property properties could cause excessive CPU usage, leading to a loss of performance and possible denial of service.

criterions.comment: mosquitto package in kinetic is affected and may need fixing.
